description: Capture high-quality photographs for events, products, and marketing materials. Must have experience with professional camera equipment and photo editing software.
Identify new business opportunities and build client relationships. Responsible for sales targets, market research, and developing growth strategies.
Oversee daily production operations, manage team schedules, ensure quality standards, and maintain safety protocols in the manufacturing facility.
Provide excellent customer service in a restaurant setting. Take orders, serve food and beverages, and ensure guest satisfaction.
Dispense medications, provide pharmaceutical care, counsel patients on drug usage, and ensure compliance with healthcare regulations.
Provide financial planning advice to clients, including investments, insurance, and retirement planning. Build and maintain client portfolio.
Create visual content for digital and print media. Design logos, brochures, social media graphics, and marketing materials using design software.
Sell new and used vehicles to customers. Demonstrate car features, negotiate prices, and complete sales documentation.
Maintain security and safety of premises. Monitor surveillance equipment, patrol areas, and respond to security incidents.
Greet visitors, manage phone calls, schedule appointments, and handle administrative tasks at the front desk.
Visit potential clients to promote and sell products. Meet sales targets, build customer relationships, and report market feedback.
Deliver packages and documents to customers in a timely manner. Ensure safe handling of goods and collect payments when required.
Support daily office operations including filing, data entry, photocopying, and assisting other staff members with administrative tasks.
Promote pharmaceutical products to healthcare professionals. Build relationships with doctors and pharmacies to increase product awareness.
Manage financial records, prepare statements, handle accounts payable/receivable, and ensure compliance with accounting standards.
Lead production team to meet manufacturing goals. Monitor quality, optimize processes, and maintain equipment standards.
Oversee store operations, manage staff, ensure customer satisfaction, and achieve sales targets. Handle inventory and merchandising.
Design, develop, and maintain software applications. Write clean code, debug programs, and collaborate with the development team.
Operate video cameras and equipment for shoots. Edit footage, manage technical setup, and ensure high-quality video production.
Present and promote medical products to healthcare providers. Develop territory sales strategies and maintain client relationships.
Photograph events, portraits, and commercial projects. Edit and retouch images to meet client specifications.
Teach students following the curriculum. Prepare lesson plans, assess student progress, and maintain classroom discipline.
Provide patient care in healthcare settings. Administer medications, monitor vital signs, and assist doctors with procedures.
Handle cash transactions, process payments, and maintain accurate register counts. Provide friendly customer service.
Welcome visitors, answer inquiries, manage calls, and perform clerical duties to support office operations.
Educate students in assigned subjects. Create engaging lessons, evaluate performance, and support student development.
Install, maintain, and repair electrical systems. Read blueprints, troubleshoot issues, and ensure electrical safety compliance.
Build and repair wooden structures and fixtures. Read technical drawings, measure materials, and use carpentry tools safely.
Lead store team, manage inventory, drive sales performance, and ensure excellent customer experience.
Inspect garments for defects and quality standards. Document issues and work with production to maintain quality levels.
Create and alter clothing based on customer specifications. Take measurements, cut fabric, and operate sewing machines.
Prepare meals according to recipes and standards. Maintain kitchen cleanliness and follow food safety guidelines.
Create engaging written content for websites, blogs, and marketing materials. Research topics and optimize content for SEO.
Assist with patient care activities, maintain cleanliness, transport patients, and support nursing staff with daily tasks.
Design and develop mobile applications for iOS and Android. Write efficient code, test apps, and fix bugs.
Build and maintain software solutions. Collaborate with teams, write documentation, and participate in code reviews.
Sell insurance policies to clients. Explain coverage options, process applications, and provide customer support.
Ensure products meet quality standards through testing and inspection. Document findings and recommend improvements.
Assist customers in purchasing vehicles. Provide product information, arrange test drives, and close sales deals.
Supervise manufacturing processes, coordinate with teams, and ensure production targets are met efficiently.
Provide hair cutting, styling, and coloring services. Consult with clients and recommend hair care products.
Perform skincare treatments, facials, and beauty services. Advise clients on skincare routines and products.
Install and repair electrical wiring and systems. Ensure compliance with electrical codes and safety standards.
Prepare financial reports, manage budgets, and handle tax filings. Ensure accuracy in all financial documentation.
Manage daily store operations, supervise staff, and implement sales strategies to achieve business goals.
Handle accounting functions including bookkeeping, reconciliations, and financial analysis for the organization.
Serve food and beverages to customers. Take orders accurately and ensure a pleasant dining experience.
Manage and maintain database systems. Ensure data security, perform backups, and optimize database performance.
Construct and install wooden structures. Work with hand and power tools to complete carpentry projects.
Pick up and deliver items to customers. Maintain delivery logs and ensure timely and safe deliveries.
Capture professional photos for various purposes. Set up lighting, edit images, and deliver final products to clients.
Maintain accurate financial records, prepare reports, and support auditing processes for the company.
Deliver compassionate patient care. Monitor health conditions, administer treatments, and maintain medical records.
Fabricate and repair wooden items and structures. Read plans and work independently on construction sites.
Diagnose and repair vehicle mechanical issues. Perform maintenance services and ensure vehicles are roadworthy.
Create and execute menus, supervise kitchen staff, and maintain high culinary standards in food preparation.
Provide technical support to users. Troubleshoot hardware and software issues and maintain IT infrastructure.
Conduct laboratory tests and experiments. Prepare samples, operate equipment, and record accurate results.
Guide customers through vehicle purchases. Present features, negotiate terms, and ensure customer satisfaction.
Sell vehicles to customers by understanding their needs, providing test drives, and completing paperwork.
Transport goods from warehouse to customers. Handle packages carefully and collect cash on delivery when needed.
Provide beauty treatments including facials, massages, and body treatments. Maintain hygiene and client satisfaction.
Cut, color, and style hair for clients. Stay updated with trends and maintain salon cleanliness.
Prepare food items following recipes. Maintain kitchen organization and adhere to food safety regulations.
Cook meals for customers or staff. Handle ingredients properly and maintain a clean cooking environment.
Handle recruitment, employee relations, and HR administration. Manage payroll processing and policy implementation.
Support hospital operations by assisting patients, maintaining equipment, and helping medical staff.
Build and repair structures using bricks, blocks, and concrete. Read construction plans and ensure quality work.
Monitor and test products for quality compliance. Identify defects and work with teams to resolve issues.
Sew and alter garments to fit customers. Work with various fabrics and handle custom orders.
Manage front desk operations, greet visitors, and coordinate administrative activities.
Sell automobiles to customers. Demonstrate vehicle features and assist with financing options.
Lead kitchen operations, create dishes, manage inventory, and ensure food quality meets standards.
Write articles, blogs, and marketing copy. Research topics thoroughly and meet publishing deadlines.
Manage warehouse operations including receiving, storing, and dispatching goods. Operate forklifts and maintain inventory.
Ensure safety and security of premises. Monitor CCTV, patrol assigned areas, and respond to security concerns.
Responsible for picking items from warehouse shelves and packing them for shipment. Ensure accuracy and package integrity.
Responsible for loading and unloading goods from transport vehicles and containers. Requires physical stamina and safe material handling.
